title: Middle East Envoy Berkowitz on Israel/UAE
itunes:title: Middle East Envoy Berkowitz on Israel/UAE
description:
Bloomberg's Kevin Cirilli speaks to Avi Berkowitz, Assistant to the President and Special Representative for International Negotiations about the joint statement released from the U.S., Israel and the United Arab Emirates announcing that the two Mideast nations will begin normalizing relations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bloomberg's Kevin Cirilli speaks to Avi Berkowitz, Assistant to the President and Special Representative for International Negotiations about the joint statement released from the U.S., Israel and the United Arab Emirates announcing that the two Mideast nations will begin normalizing relations.
